scripts.dev: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/ltd -c recipe.json > output.json
scripts.dev-dry: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/ltd -c recipe.json -e dry > output.json
scripts.debug: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net --inspect-brk  scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/ltd -c recipe.json > output.json
